content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 units of stone, and my inventory now includes:
# - 5 coal
# - 10 stone
# - 1 iron plate
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# Now that I have the necessary stone, I can proceed to craft the additional stone furnace.

# Let's craft the stone furnace now.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Craft one stone furnace

# After crafting the stone furnace, I will check the updated inventory.
print(f"Updated Inventory after crafting Stone Furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting the stone furnace.
